title: Modernism, values and trust
abstractText:
This project looks at artistic modernism in relation to two other forms of visual culture­ classicism, and commodity culture. 
It seeks to examine the ways in which modernism may have functioned as a space within which the competing claims of both were mediated and addressed. In particular, it will look at the question of whether modernism served as a bridge between cultures based on value and those based on trust. 
The object of the project is to establish a conceptual framework for comparative historical enquiry.
